bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu zha 酒齇 , wine sediments. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi liu huang 石 硫黃 quoting Xuan ming lun fang 宣明論方 3: 面鼻生紫赤風刺癮疹 , 俗呼為肺風者 , “Face and nose grow purple-red wind thorns and hidden papules. A colloquial term is ‘ lung wind’”, speaks of 鼻面紫風 , purple-nose-and-face wind ”. and defines it as resulting from 風熱上攻陽明經絡 , “Wind heat rising and attacking yang brilliance conduits and network conduits”.
